mapper.insert: insert into db_performance (SEQUENCEID, OPER, POINT, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, 'STATUS', OPERID, GROUPID, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, ALERTFLAG, DESCR, POINTDESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alertflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{pointdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_performance set OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POINT = #{point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERID = #{operid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALERTFLAG = #{alertflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, POINTDESCR = #{pointdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, OPER, POINT, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, 'STATUS', OPERID, GROUPID, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, ALERTFLAG, DESCR, POINTDESCR from db_performance where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, OPER, POINT, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, 'STATUS', OPERID, GROUPID, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, ALERTFLAG, DESCR, POINTDESCR from db_performance
